statements: DELETE FROM packaging_information WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM packaging_information WHERE id = 1 AND compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM packaging_information WHERE product_name = 'Example Product' AND packaging_material = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM packaging_specifications WHERE id = 1 AND package_type = 'Box';
DELETE FROM safety_standards WHERE product_name = 'Product A' AND compliance_status = 'Compliant';
DELETE FROM safety_standards WHERE description = 'High Safety Level';
DELETE FROM packaging_specifications WHERE product_name = 'Box' AND weight > 10;
DELETE FROM inspection_records WHERE inspector_id = 100 AND result = 'Fail';
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE is_compliant = false AND report_date < '2022-10-01';
